title: RP Cards
body: I have moved from America to Europe, and I wanted to transfer my account also. It seems the Europe RP cards don't work in the NA server..I have already bought one and was wondering if there was anyway of putting money onto the account with this. If not what would be the ways to put money onto the account..besides using a credit card.

replies.body: Aye, RP Cards are restricted to the region it was intended for.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case, and our billing team can find some options for you.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
I would submit a ticket to support, they'd likely be able to help you get the funds from your RP card onto your account. You might need the receipt you got after purchasing it.
